de.weltraumschaf.groundzero.transform

Class ReportProcessor

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.weltraumschaf.groundzero.transform.ReportProcessor

  • public class ReportProcessor
extends Object
    Process a single Checkstyle report file.
    Author:
    Sven Strittmatter

    • Method Detail

      • process

        public CheckstyleReport process(String reportFileName)
                         throws de.weltraumschaf.commons.ApplicationException
        Process the report given as file name.
        Parameters:
        reportFileName - file name of the report, must not be null or empty
        Returns:
        always new instance, never null
        Throws:
        de.weltraumschaf.commons.ApplicationException - if file I/O or XML parse errors occurs

      • process

        public CheckstyleReport process(File input)
                         throws de.weltraumschaf.commons.ApplicationException
        Process the report given as file.
        Parameters:
        input - file name of the report, must not be null
        Returns:
        always new instance, never null
        Throws:
        de.weltraumschaf.commons.ApplicationException - if file I/O or XML parse errors occurs

        Save suppressions configuration to file.
        Parameters:
        suppression - must not be null
        Throws:
        de.weltraumschaf.commons.ApplicationException - if an error occurs while writing suppressions configuration to file
